Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps track of information going on in the instance of Simulation It will add aircraft to the queue and dequeue them into the current aircraft they will then do take off actions or will depart, increment up time. There are several getter methods that return values of the statistics for use elsewhere.

      Constructor and Description
      Simulation()

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Departure()
      If the Queue is full, it returns false, if currentAircraft is not null, it will increment time up by 2 and then add a new aircraft at the current time in the queue.
      int getacWaited()
      returns the number of aircraft waited
      java.lang.String getCurrentacInfo()
      This returns the current aircrafts information of aircraft number and arrival time.
      int getCurrentTime()
      returns the current time
      int getNoWait()
      returns the number of aircraft that didnt wait
      int getQueueSize()
      returns the size of the queue
      java.lang.String getTakeOffInfo()
      This returls the current aircraft info and takeoff information and the size of the queue.
      int gettookOff()
      returns the number of planes that took off
      int getWaitTime()
      returns Total wait time
      void increaseTime(int time)
      This takes an input and increases the time by whatever the parameter time is

      Testbed main section
      boolean TakeOff()
      checks if current aircraft is null and returns false, otherwise, it increases the time and increments up tookoff by 1 and then returns true.
      void updateQueue()
      This method updates the queue to the appropriate value.

      • TakeOff

        public boolean TakeOff()
        checks if current aircraft is null and returns false, otherwise, it increases the time and increments up tookoff by 1 and then returns true.
        Returns:

      • Departure

        public boolean Departure()
        If the Queue is full, it returns false, if currentAircraft is not null, it will increment time up by 2 and then add a new aircraft at the current time in the queue. If the current aircraft is nuyll, it will make a new aircraft and increment up nowait.
        Returns:

      • updateQueue

        public void updateQueue()
        This method updates the queue to the appropriate value. if the queue is empty, the current aircraft is null. else the current aircraft is equal to the next aircraft in the queue. It then calculates the time for waiting and adds it and increments up acWaited by one.
